text: Generalized periodic epileptiform discharges (GPEDs) are very rare abnormal patterns found in EEG. ==Types== Based on the interval between the discharges they are classified as: * Periodic short-interval diffuse discharges (PSIDDs) * Periodic long-interval diffuse discharges (PLIDDs) * Burst suppression patterns ==References== Category:Electroencephalography Category:Neuroscience
title: Generalized periodic epileptiform discharges
